content: flax a simple modern pullover ♥ by tin can knits flax sweater a simple modern pullover from tin can knits learn to knit with alexa and emily the flax sweater is part of the simple collection a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials knit it in the free tin can knits app see only your size help linked on each instruction make notes and tick through sizing suggested needles 0-6 mo 6-12 mo 1-2 yrs 2-4 yrs 4-6 yrs 6-8 yrs us #4 / 3 5mm & us #6 / 4mm 8-10 yrs adult xs s sm m ml l xl xxl 3xl or as required to meet gauge 4xl 5xl 6xl sizes listed in this order unless 0 to 2 yrs 16 circular and dpns* in each size otherwise noted 4 to 10 yrs 16 24 circulars and dpns* in each size see sizing table for garment measurements xs to xl 16 32 circulars and dpns* in each size yarn xxl to 6xl 16 32 48 circulars and dpns* in larger size 16 48 circulars and dpns* in dk weight yarn - see sizing table for yardages smaller size dk weight sample shown in plucky knitter *magic loop technique with a single long circular sweater dk in princess phone and worsted needle can be used in place of dpns weight samples are shown in sweetgeorgia superwash worsted deep olive hush and notions tumbled stone darning needle stitch markers gauge 22 sts & 30 rounds / 4 in stockinette on larger needles flax sweater dk facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 2 sizing notes two body length options are given c1 is the cropped length option c2 is the regular length option emily is wearing size xl 46 cropped with 4 of positive ease jordan is wearing size l 42 with 2 of positive ease emily is wearing size s 34 with 2 of negative ease and jones is wearing size 1-2 yrs 22 with 3 of positive ease sizing table the sizing table lists finished garment measurements choose a size based upon your chest measurement plus desired ease lengths are given in inches and yards one inch = 2 54 cm one yard = 0 91 m yardage* size a b1 b2 b3 c1 c2 d e c1 c2 0-6 mo 18 2 4 6 5 4 6 6 5 4 260 300 6-12 mo 20 5 2 5 7 5 4 6 5 7 25 4 5 320 380 flax sweater dk facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 sezis dlihc 1-2 yrs 22 2 6 8 5 5 7 7 5 5 400 440 2-4 yrs 24 3 7 10 5 6 8 8 25 5 5 500 560 4-6 yrs 26 3 9 12 7 10 8 75 6 620 700 6-8 yrs 28 5 3 10 13 8 13 9 5 6 5 720 860 8-10 yrs 30 3 11 15 9 15 10 5 7
